info.title: SMTP2GO API
info.description: SMTP2GO is a scalable email and SMS service provider that simplifies delivery for everyday senders and businesses. This API allows you to send emails/SMS, access reporting and statistics, and manage account features programmatically.

servers.description: Global endpoint (automatically routes to nearest region)

tags.name: SMS
tags.description: Send and view SMS messages (paid plans only)

tags.name: Single Sender Emails
tags.description: Manage individual authorized sender email addresses

tags.name: Email Archiving
tags.description: Search and view archived emails (paid plans only)

tags.name: Suppressions
tags.description: Manage suppressed email addresses and domains

tags.name: IP Allowlist
tags.description: Manage IP address allowlist for sending restrictions

post.description: Send an email by providing email components (sender, recipient, subject, body) as JSON. Maximum email size: 50 MB. Maximum recipients per field: 100.
Send a pre-composed MIME email string. Maximum email size: 50 MB.
Search previously sent emails by various criteria
Send SMS messages to single or multiple recipients (up to 100). Paid plans only. Additional charges apply.
View SMS messages received if a recipient responds. Paid plans only.
Search email events such as bounces, opens, clicks, and unsubscribes. Rate limit: 60 requests per minute.
View the list of allowed or blocked sender addresses/domains
Add an email address or domain to the allowed/blocked senders list
Remove an email address or domain from the allowed/blocked senders list
Update allowed senders feature configuration (allowlist vs blocklist mode)
View all SMTP authentication users in the account
Create a new SMTP authentication user
Update an existing SMTP authentication user
Delete an SMTP authentication user
View all sender domains in the account
Add a new sender domain to the account
Remove a sender domain from the account
Verify a sender domain's DNS records (SPF, DKIM)
Configure custom tracking domain for a sender domain
Configure custom return path domain for a sender domain
View all authorized individual sender email addresses

200.description: Single sender emails list returned successfully

post.description: Authorize an individual email address to send (alternative to domain verification)
Remove an authorized individual sender email address
Retrieve email bounce statistics
Retrieve email cycle and usage statistics
Retrieve historical email statistics
Retrieve spam complaint statistics
Retrieve unsubscribe statistics
Retrieve comprehensive email summary statistics
Search archived emails (paid plans only, requires email archiving enabled)
Retrieve a specific archived email by ID (paid plans only)
Create a new subaccount (paid plans only)
Update an existing subaccount (paid plans only)
Close an active subaccount (paid plans only)
Reopen a closed subaccount (paid plans only)
Resend invitation email to subaccount user (paid plans only)
View all suppressed email addresses and domains
Add an email address or domain to the suppression list
Remove an email address or domain from the suppression list
Check if IP allowlist feature is enabled
View all IP addresses in the allowlist
Add an IP address to the allowlist

200.description: IP address added to allowlist successfully

post.description: Update an existing IP allowlist entry
Remove an IP address from the allowlist

200.description: IP address removed from allowlist successfully

post.description: Retrieve details of a specific email template
Search for email templates by criteria
Create a new email template
Update an existing email template
Delete an existing email template
View all configured webhooks
Create a new webhook configuration. Free plans limited to 1 webhook, paid plans up to 10.
Update an existing webhook configuration
Delete an existing webhook configuration

ApiKeyHeader.name: X-Smtp2go-Api-Key
ApiKeyHeader.description: API key authentication via header. Alternatively, you can include 'api_key' in the request body for any endpoint.

api_key.description: API key for authentication (optional if using header authentication)
API key for authentication (optional if using header authentication)

cc.description: Array of CC recipient email addresses (max 100)

bcc.description: Array of BCC recipient email addresses (max 100)

inlines.description: Array of inline attachments (for embedding images)

template_id.description: Template ID to use for email content

api_key.description: API key for authentication (optional if using header authentication)

limit.description: Maximum number of results to return

only_latest.description: Return only latest event per email

sender.description: Email address or domain to add
Email address or domain to remove

address.description: Email address or domain to suppress

usernames.description: SMTP users or API keys to trigger webhook for

BadRequest.description: Bad request - missing or invalid parameters

Unauthorized.description: Unauthorized - invalid or missing API key

Forbidden.description: Forbidden - API key lacks required permissions

NotFound.description: Not found - requested resource does not exist

TooManyRequests.description: Too many requests - rate limit exceeded
